trans-unit.source: Specifies the impersonation behavior for a service operation on a service instance.
trans-unit.target: 指定服务实例上的服务操作的模拟行为。

trans-unit.source: Use the ImpersonationOption enumeration to control impersonation in [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的控件模拟 ImpersonationOption 枚举[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This setting interacts with a configuration property on <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A> in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 此设置进行交互的配置属性<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A>下表中。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations%2A>

trans-unit.source: Impersonation is performed if credentials are available and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*> is equal to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果凭据可用执行模拟和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>等同于<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*> is equal to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, a validation exception occurs at service startup time.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>等同于<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，在服务启动时则会发生验证异常。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceAuthorizationElement.ImpersonateCallerForAllOperations*>
